availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edwin F. Williams (Hopkins Co. Ky, farmer and barkeeper )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, barkeeper. Illinois native. Farmer in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned two enslaved people in Henderson County in 1850. Barkeeper in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 2, p. 334B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 2.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 625.
